aiEngine.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 yi hlohlotela switsundzuxo swa wena. Endla matsalwa, swifaniso na tivhidiyo leswi fambelanaka na vayingiseri va SA.

scheduling.description: AI yi dyondza minkarhi leyi faneleke swinene yo rhumela eka vayingiseri va wena. Hlela nhundzu wa n'hweti hinkwayo eka timinitsi ta 10.

step1.title: Hlamusela Vibe ya Wena
step1.description: Byela Purple Glow leswi u swi xavisiaka kumbe swi khutazaka. Hlawula muxaka wa wena: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, kumbe Cyberpunk.

step2.title: AI yi Endla Nhundzu
step2.description: Muchini wa hina lowu hlohloteliwaka hi Gemini wu endla switsundzuxo leswi lunghiseteriweke pulatifomo na swifaniso eka tisekondzi.

step3.title: Hlela & Rhumela
step3.description: Kambisisa, lulamisa kumbe hlela. Purple Glow yi tirha leswi sele—na le yi ringanyeta minkarhi leyi faneleke yo rhumela.
